result.name: iquanta
result.notes: iQuanta is a web-based service provided to operational staff in police forces, Community Safety Partnerships (CSPs) and HMIC.

organization.name: home-office
organization.title: Home Office
organization.description:
The Home Office leads on immigration and passports, drugs policy, crime policy and counter-terrorism and works to ensure visible, responsive and accountable policing in the UK.

Home Office is a ministerial department, supported by 26 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/home-office

result.title: iQuanta

extras.value: iQuanta allows users to access provisional data before finalised National Statistics are published. Accordingly, the service is accessible only to accredited users and has clear terms and conditions set out limiting public use of the data before the statistics are officially published.
